welcome.title: Welcome to Ersha Ecosystem!
welcome.description: Hello! I'm here to help you learn how to use our agricultural platform. I'll guide you through each feature step by step. You can ask me to repeat anything, and I'll speak in your preferred language.

verification.title: Get Verified First
verification.description: To sell products and access all features, you need to verify your identity. Click the verification button to start. This helps keep our marketplace safe and trustworthy.

marketplace.title: Explore the Marketplace
marketplace.description: This is where you can buy and sell agricultural products. You can see what other farmers are selling and set your own prices. Click here to explore.

postProduct.title: Post Your Products
postProduct.description: Ready to sell? Click here to add your products to the marketplace. You can upload photos, set prices, and describe your items. Make sure to include good photos!

orders.title: Manage Your Orders
orders.description: When someone buys your products, you'll see the order here. You can track deliveries, update status, and communicate with buyers. This is your business center.

weather.title: Check Weather Information
weather.description: Get weather forecasts for your area to plan your farming activities. This helps you know when to plant, water, or harvest your crops.

advisory.title: Get Expert Advice
advisory.description: Learn from agricultural experts and access farming guides. You can ask questions, watch videos, and get tips to improve your farming practices.

completion.title: You're All Set!
completion.description: Congratulations! You've learned the basics of our platform. You can now start selling your products, buying from others, and growing your agricultural business. Good luck!
completion.success: Tour completed successfully! You're ready to start using the platform.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Options
accessibility.description: Make the platform easier to use with these accessibility features

largeText.title: Large Text
largeText.description: Make text bigger and easier to read

highContrast.title: High Contrast
highContrast.description: Use high contrast colors for better visibility

simpleMode.title: Simple Mode
simpleMode.description: Show fewer options and simpler navigation

screenReader.title: Screen Reader Support
screenReader.description: Optimized for screen readers and assistive technologies

touchFriendly.title: Touch Friendly
touchFriendly.description: Large touch targets for mobile devices

voiceCommands.title: Voice Commands
voiceCommands.description: You can use voice commands to navigate the platform
voiceCommands.notUnderstood: I didn't understand that. Please try again.

questions.question: How do I sell my products?
questions.answer: First, verify your account, then go to the marketplace and click 'Post Product'. Add photos, set prices, and describe your items.

questions.question: How do I get paid?
questions.answer: We use secure payment methods. Money is held safely until the buyer receives their order, then released to you.

questions.question: What if my product doesn't sell?
questions.answer: You can adjust your price, improve your photos, or try different products. Our advisory section has tips for better sales.

questions.question: How do I track my orders?
questions.answer: Go to the logistics section to see all your orders and their delivery status. You'll get notifications when orders update.

features.discoverPowerfulFeatures: Discover powerful features designed to help farmers and merchants connect, trade, and grow their agricultural businesses.
features.title: Why Choose Ersha Ecosystem?
features.subtitle: Comprehensive Agricultural Solutions
features.description: Our platform provides everything you need to succeed in modern agriculture

directMarketplace.title: Direct Marketplace
directMarketplace.description: Connect directly with buyers and sellers without intermediaries. Our platform eliminates middlemen, ensuring fair prices and transparent transactions.

integratedPayments.title: Integrated Payments
integratedPayments.description: Secure and convenient payment solutions with multiple options. From mobile money to bank transfers, we support all major payment methods.

financialGrowth.title: Financial Growth
financialGrowth.description: Build your credit score and access financial services. Track your sales, manage your business, and grow your agricultural enterprise.

smartAnalytics.title: Smart Analytics
smartAnalytics.description: AI-powered insights and market analysis. Get data-driven recommendations to optimize your farming and business decisions.

securityTrust.title: Security & Trust
securityTrust.description: Your security is our priority. We use advanced encryption and verification systems to protect your data and transactions.
